document_data.name: ''Aegisheart''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Aegisheart''''' was a [[magic]]al [[short sword]] that was the favored [[weapon]] of [[Arvoreen]], the [[halfling]] [[deity]] of guardians and defense. His avatar wielded it, alongside ''[[Hornet (sword)|Hornet]]'', another enchanted short sword.<ref name=frcs-3e-p240">
document_data.Powers: ''Aegisheart'' was a ''+4'' ''[[defending]]'' short sword. Arvoreen was able to transform this [[sword]] into another form via ''[[weapon shift]]'', but was able to bypass the restriction that the weapon must be magical.
